Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-27144 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.2-20
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-27144 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.2-20. A patched version of the package is available.
